comment: A relationship between the rank function and the cumulative hierarchy of sets function ` R1 ` . Proposition 9.15(2) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Mar-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
